blogPost.excerpt: Paraglide is the first machine learning API that lets you create, customize, and collaborate on automated AI workflows in minutes. Modify what you want, and let us handle the rest.
blogPost.body: Paraglide is the first machine learning API that lets you create, customize, and collaborate on automated AI workflows in minutes. Modify what you want, and let us handle the rest.
blogPost.title: Paraglide - Create automated AI workflows in minutes.
blogPost.author: Robleh Jama

localize.description: Paraglide是第一个机器学习API，让你可以在几分钟内创建、定制和协作自动化AI工作流程。修改你想要的东西，让我们来处理剩下的事情。
localize.tagline: 在几分钟内创建自动化的AI工作流程。

localize.description: Paraglide是第一個機器學習API，讓你可以在幾分鐘內創建、定製和協作自動化AI工作流程。修改你想要的東西，讓我們來處理剩下的事情。
localize.tagline: 在幾分鐘內創建自動化的AI工作流程。

previous.excerpt: Storetasker matches you to a trusted Shopify Expert within a few hours for projects big and small. We've interviewed over 5,000 developers, hand selected the top 5%, and streamlined the experience from end to end.
previous.title: Storetasker 2.0 - Where Shopify brands meet their developer

localize.description: Storetasker 会在几小时内为您匹配到值得信赖的 Shopify 专家，为您提供大大小小的项目。我们已经采访了超过5000名开发人员，亲自挑选了前5%的开发人员，并从头到尾简化了体验。
localize.tagline: Shopify品牌在哪里遇到他们的开发者

localize.description: Storetasker 會在幾小時內爲您匹配到值得信賴的 Shopify 專家，爲您提供大大小小的項目。我們已經採訪了超過5000名開發人員，親自挑選了前5%的開發人員，並從頭到尾簡化了體驗。
localize.tagline: Shopify品牌在哪裏遇到他們的開發者

next.excerpt: A lot of apps include a system “Share” menu, but the default share services are usually not very useful. Shareful provides some useful share services like Copy, Open In, Save As, and Save to Downloads.
next.title: Shareful - Supercharge the macOS share menu

localize.description: 很多应用都包含了系统的 "共享 "菜单，但默认的共享服务通常都不是很有用。Shareful提供了一些有用的共享服务，比如复制、打开在、另存为和保存到下载。
很多應用都包含了系統的 "共享 "菜單，但默認的共享服務通常都不是很有用。Shareful提供了一些有用的共享服務，比如複製、打開在、另存爲和保存到下載。
